K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-048:138b-0: @138b dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-048:138b-1: sangs rgyas kun nas thogs med ston la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-048:138b-3: 'di bzung bas 'phags pa rma bya chen mo gzung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-048:138b-4: 'phags pa rma bya chen mo'i snying po rdzogs so ////
